meanings.sent1: The teacher was adjuring the students to pay attention during the important lesson.
meanings.sent2: She adjured her dog to stop barking by using a firm tone.
meanings.sent3: The magician adjured the audience to keep their eyes closed during the trick.
meanings.sent4: The captain adjured his crew to stay calm during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The coach adjured the team to give their best effort in the upcoming match.

meanings.definition: To appeal to or entreat earnestly
meanings.sent1: The child was adjuring his parents to buy him a new toy.
meanings.sent2: She adjured her friend to reconsider the risky decision.
meanings.sent3: The beggar adjured the passersby for some spare change.
meanings.sent4: The student adjured the teacher for extra credit to improve his grade.
meanings.sent5: The hiker adjured his companions to take a break and enjoy the view.
